dia.str: Jilian almost got herself banished. You helped her with the bear. In the end, the both of you came to your senses. It's a truly hard thing to admit you are wrong, especially in the shadow of success. Both of you are still young but you showed us you are honorable people. It would have been devastating to lose Jilian. She is a great hunter. I thank you. Talk to me whenever you like and I will teach you how to hunt.
